author: Terry
content: The LAST thing Trump wants is to cripple our premier companies which certainly includes AAPL. Pay no attention to the bottom dwellers. AAPL - Long and Strong.

author: Fred
content: almost every time the analysts upgrade this garbage, it goes the other way. I would like to ask the analysts, please don't and leave this garbage alone

content: Bullish: Long Term Stock! See me in 6 months !

content: Amazon is also at risk due to Chinese tariffs.  Most of their products are made in China
